feed.title: Math Guy who does some CS
feed.subtitle: This is my way of sharing any cool things I do when I find the time to make blog posts.

entry.title: Some More Math Handouts

entry.title: Incomplete Information Handout
entry.content: I have finished the first draft of the Incomplete Information Game Theory handout, which I plan on giving a lecture on at Winter Camp 2021. Check it out below!
entry.summary: I have finished the first draft of the Incomplete Information Game Theory handout, which I plan on giving a lecture on at Winter Camp 2021. Check it out below!

entry.title: Game Theory Handout
entry.content:
Currently, I am working on a new Game Theory handout based on games without perfect information. In the meantime, I have linked an older handout on game theory below.

Combinatorics is honestly my favourite math subject, so no coincidence that I like CS, and I really enjoy gaming, so game theory seems like a perfect combo between the two.
entry.summary: Currently, I am working on a new Game Theory handout based on games without perfect information. In the meantime, I have linked an older handout on game theory below.

entry.title: Welcome to My Blog!
entry.content:
Hey guys! Welcome to my blog. This winter break, I am in the process of creating my own website and blog.

Check out my website here.

I will be blogging about a lot of various stuff, but it will mainly be focussed on math and CS.
entry.summary: Hey guys! Welcome to my blog. This winter break, I am in the process of creating my own website and blog.
